Text.Name: Item_BoarLeather
Text.Desc: Boar skin with a rough texture, but it's relatively firm.

Text.Name: Item_RabbitLeather
Text.Desc: The fur of a rabbit, very soft and warm.

Text.Name: Item_BearLeather
Text.Desc: The fur of a bear, very soft and warm.

Text.Name: Item_WolfLeather
Text.Desc: A piece of wolf hide, firm and durable.

Text.Name: Item_FeiLeather
Text.Desc: Hide of the demon beast Fei with magical power dwelling within it. Warm in winter and cool in summer. It is even capable of blocking Qi damage.

Text.Name: Item_LuShuLeather
Text.Desc: Hide of the spirit beast Lushu, with magical power dwelling within it. Warm in winter and cool in summer. It is even capable of blocking Qi damage.

Text.Name: Item_CattleLeather
Text.Desc: A piece of bull hide, firm and durable.

Text.Name: Item_TigerLeather
Text.Desc: A piece of tiger hide, firm and durable.

Text.Name: Item_YaoLeather
Text.Desc: Hide of a demon beast, with demonic power dwelling within it. Warm in winter and cool in summer. It is even capable of blocking Qi damage.

Text.Name: Item_YaoLeather1
Text.Desc: Hide of a great demon beast, with powerful demonic power dwelling within it. Warm in winter and cool in summer. It is even capable of effectively blocking Qi damage.
